head.supplied: ¶ [Forbes H. O. director Christchurch Museum. That he be presented with certain works. ¶ Dated to 17 June 1891, as M to W. Fielder, 17 June 1891, is a related request for copies ofVictorian Naturalis...

div.p: No. 5860, vol. 1891 R, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, entered on 18 June 1891.
[Forbes H. O. director Christchurch Museum. That he be presented with certain works.
Dated to 17 June 1891, as M to W. Fielder, 17 June 1891, is a related request for copies of Victorian Naturalist.On 19 June,M'sletter was transferred to the Premier's Department (No. 1740, VPRS 1164 register of inwards correspondence, vol. 10, VA 672 Premier's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria), where the register entry is 'That Smyths Aborigines & Currs Australian Race be presented to Director of Christchurch Museum, NZ' [Smyth (1878), Curr (1886-7), bothof whichwere
published by the Government Printer]. Forbes had evidently requested M's help inobtainingpublished works.
]
